channel.title: CVE Feed for openEuler -- kernel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for openEuler -- kernel

item.title: CVE-2021-33631|2024-07-23T20:45:02.175Z -- openeuler -- kernel
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in openEuler kernel on Linux (filesystem modules) allows Forced Integer Overflow.This issue affects openEuler kernel: from 4.19.90 before 4.19.90-2401.3, from 5.10.0-60.18.0 before 5.10.0-183.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-24898|2024-06-04T17:43:39.624Z -- openeuler -- kernel
item.description:
Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in openEuler kernel on Linux allows Resource Leak Exposure. This vulnerability is associated with program files https://gitee.Com/openeuler/kernel/blob/openEuler-1.0-LTS/drivers/staging/gmjstcm/tcm.C.
This issue affects kernel: from 4.19.90-2109.1.0.0108 before 4.19.90-2403.4.0.0244.

item.title: CVE-2024-24891|2024-04-15T12:03:40.643Z -- openeuler -- kernel
item.description:
Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in openEuler kernel on Linux allows Resource Leak Exposure. This vulnerability is associated with program files https://gitee.Com/openeuler/kernel/blob/openEuler-1.0-LTS/drivers/staging/gmjstcm/tcm.C.
This issue affects kernel: from 4.19.90-2109.1.0.0108 before 4.19.90-2403.4.0.0244.
